attributes.comment:
Please reconsider this very large increase in fees for the families who are providing
homes for children. Adoption is already very costly, and there is nothing that the
US can do for its families regarding foreign fees. This is one area where the US
can help its families while providing homes for orphaned children. Many people
decide international adoption is not an option for them because of financing, and
this should NEVER be a reason a child goes without a family. Even organizations
that give grants for international adoption often require CIS approval before giving a
grant, which means the CIS fee comes out of pocket and is not (as commonly)
reimbursed. Please reconsider this hefty fee increase. It makes a difference for
thousands of the world's children each year!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
